"The AXON-School is a good exercise to know your class and the children in it. Using this tool we can work as a school to improve the students' performance. In order to better understand the child, the teacher should be fully equipped with the reports as attention span is very important in today's life for getting better results"The Millennium School, Gurgaon, India.
Educational team memberThe Millennium School, Gurgaon, India.
"It is important to know about our own attention – it helps us in certain ways. I want to find ways to improve my attention"
Hylav Pratavsi, StudentThe Millennium School, Gurgaon, India.
"We see AXON-School as a professional educational tool. Axon-School helps the educational team overachieve educational targets in a professional and measurable way, giving us the ability to advance every student and maximize his or hers abilities"
Mrs. Levana Milon, School principleMofet Ramot Alon, Jerusalem, Israel.

About

AXON-School™, designed for K-12 students, facilitates communication and activities around the students’ attentional world by connecting teachers, parents and pupils through a new language that focusses on the student attentional world. By doing so, Axon School assists in establishing optimal performance at school and in life in general.
